languages.text: "К сожалению, к списку моих талантов не относится умение быть в нескольких местах разом. Потому я хочу, чтобы мной побыли вы. Как вы понимаете, подобное доверие я могу оказать не каждому. Почувствуйте сами, каково быть в моей шкуре, пытаясь заставить кучку сварливых упрямцев действовать сообща".

"To my chagrin, the ability to be in two places at once does not number among my talents. That is why I wish for you to serve in my stead. I place such trust in very few people, you understand. You will feel what it is to walk in my shoes and attempt to compel a gaggle of quarrelsome blockheads to work together."
languages.original_text: "К сожалению, к списку моих талантов не относится умение быть в нескольких местах разом. Потому я хочу, чтобы мной побыли вы. Как вы понимаете, подобное доверие я могу оказать не каждому. Почувствуйте сами, каково быть в моей шкуре, пытаясь заставить кучку сварливых упрямцев действовать сообща".

traits.locale_text: "To my chagrin, the ability to be in two places at once does not number among my talents. That is why I wish for you to serve in my stead. I place such trust in very few people, you understand. You will feel what it is to walk in my shoes and attempt to compel a gaggle of quarrelsome blockheads to work together."

"To my chagrin, the ability to be in two places at once does not number among my talents. That is why I wish for you to serve in my stead. I place such trust in very few people, you understand. You will feel what it is to walk in my shoes and attempt to compel a gaggle of quarrelsome blockheads to work together."

"To my chagrin, the ability to be in two places at once does not number among my talents. That is why I wish for you to serve in my stead. I place such trust in very few people, you understand. You will feel what it is to walk in my shoes and attempt to compel a gaggle of quarrelsome blockheads to work together."

"To my chagrin, the ability to be in two places at once does not number among my talents. That is why I wish for you to serve in my stead. I place such trust in very few people, you understand. You will feel what it is to walk in my shoes and attempt to compel a gaggle of quarrelsome blockheads to work together."

languages.text: “令我懊恼的是，虽然我有各种各样的天赋，但我没有办法同时出现在两个不同的地方。因此，我希望你能行使我的职责。你应该明白，我很少会这样信任别人。你可以站在我的立场上亲身体会，感受一下努力让一群吵吵嚷嚷的蠢货携手合作是种什么样的滋味。”
languages.original_text: "To my chagrin, the ability to be in two places at once does not number among my talents. That is why I wish for you to serve in my stead. I place such trust in very few people, you understand. You will feel what it is to walk in my shoes and attempt to compel a gaggle of quarrelsome blockheads to work together."

traits.locale_text: “令我懊恼的是，虽然我有各种各样的天赋，但我没有办法同时出现在两个不同的地方。因此，我希望你能行使我的职责。你应该明白，我很少会这样信任别人。你可以站在我的立场上亲身体会，感受一下努力让一群吵吵嚷嚷的蠢货携手合作是种什么样的滋味。”

languages.text: «Muy a mi pesar, entre mis talentos no se encuentra el de estar en dos sitios a la vez. Por eso quiero que actúe en mi lugar. Espero que entienda que no es algo que confío a cualquiera. Pronto verá lo que es estar en mi lugar e intentar convencer a un hatajo de imbéciles pendencieros de que colaboren».
languages.original_text: "To my chagrin, the ability to be in two places at once does not number among my talents. That is why I wish for you to serve in my stead. I place such trust in very few people, you understand. You will feel what it is to walk in my shoes and attempt to compel a gaggle of quarrelsome blockheads to work together."

traits.locale_text: «Muy a mi pesar, entre mis talentos no se encuentra el de estar en dos sitios a la vez. Por eso quiero que actúe en mi lugar. Espero que entienda que no es algo que confío a cualquiera. Pronto verá lo que es estar en mi lugar e intentar convencer a un hatajo de imbéciles pendencieros de que colaboren».

languages.text: 「残念なことに、同時にふたつの地点に存在できる能力は私にはない。そこでだ、お前には私の代わりに動いてもらいたい。私がごく少数の者をよく信頼しているのは知ってのとおりだ。お前は私と同様、やかましいばか者どもの群れが共働するよう働くのだ」
languages.original_text: "To my chagrin, the ability to be in two places at once does not number among my talents. That is why I wish for you to serve in my stead. I place such trust in very few people, you understand. You will feel what it is to walk in my shoes and attempt to compel a gaggle of quarrelsome blockheads to work together."

traits.locale_text: 「残念なことに、同時にふたつの地点に存在できる能力は私にはない。そこでだ、お前には私の代わりに動いてもらいたい。私がごく少数の者をよく信頼しているのは知ってのとおりだ。お前は私と同様、やかましいばか者どもの群れが共働するよう働くのだ」

languages.text: « À mon grand désarroi, je n'ai pas le don d'ubiquité, c'est pourquoi j'aimerais que vous serviez en mon nom. Je n'accorde une telle confiance qu'à très peu de gens, vous savez. Vous allez comprendre ce que l'on ressent à un poste tel que le mien, quand il faut tout faire pour forcer un troupeau d'ânes bâtés à travailler de concert. »
languages.original_text: "To my chagrin, the ability to be in two places at once does not number among my talents. That is why I wish for you to serve in my stead. I place such trust in very few people, you understand. You will feel what it is to walk in my shoes and attempt to compel a gaggle of quarrelsome blockheads to work together."

traits.locale_text: « À mon grand désarroi, je n'ai pas le don d'ubiquité, c'est pourquoi j'aimerais que vous serviez en mon nom. Je n'accorde une telle confiance qu'à très peu de gens, vous savez. Vous allez comprendre ce que l'on ressent à un poste tel que le mien, quand il faut tout faire pour forcer un troupeau d'ânes bâtés à travailler de concert. »

languages.text: "Zu meinem Leidwesen gehört die Fähigkeit, an zwei Orten gleichzeitig zu sein, nicht zu meinen Talenten. Deshalb möchte ich, dass Ihr an meiner Statt tätig werdet. Ich investiere so viel Vertrauen in sehr wenige Personen, müsst Ihr wissen. Ihr werdet erfahren, wie es ist, in meinen Schuhen zu wandeln und zu versuchen, einen Haufen streitsüchtiger Sturschädel zur Zusammenarbeit zu bewegen."
languages.original_text: "To my chagrin, the ability to be in two places at once does not number among my talents. That is why I wish for you to serve in my stead. I place such trust in very few people, you understand. You will feel what it is to walk in my shoes and attempt to compel a gaggle of quarrelsome blockheads to work together."

Ich investiere so viel Vertrauen in sehr wenige Personen, müsst Ihr wissen. Ihr werdet erfahren, wie es ist, in meinen Schuhen zu wandeln und zu versuchen, einen Haufen streitsüchtiger Sturschädel zur Zusammenarbeit zu bewegen."
